recipe.title: The Smoky Robinson
ingredients: 1 1/2 ounces Tennessee whiskey (such as George Dickel)
instructions: For the maple-spiced simple syrup: In a small saucepan, combine maple syrup with spices and 1/2 cup water. Bring to a boil and turn off the heat. Cover and let stand for at least 30 minutes (or up to overnight), and then strain into a clean container.

For each cocktail: In a cocktail shaker, combine whiskey, mezcal, maple-spiced simple syrup, and lemon juice. Add ice and shake. Strain into an ice-filled rocks glass and garnish with lemon twist.
